ComicInfo.Title: Fantastic Fools
ComicInfo.Summary:
Saturday morning cartoons are back! The Robonic Stooges leap from the TV screen to comics with another slapstick issue! In "Fantastic Fools" the Robonic Stooges attempt to stop a meteor hurtling toward Earth only to awaken the MoleShemp! And in "The Island of DrEams" the boys win a vacation to a tropic island. Unfortunately instead of a vacation they end up the pawns of a strangely poetic mad scientist! This issue is crammed with awesome extras too - all taking you back to the days watching cartoons with your favorite bowl of cereal. The Robonic Stooges #2 Fantastic Fools is available with three covers - Main by Eric Shanower, Variant by Dean Rankine, and a 350 copy Limited Edition Black & White collector's variant!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Main Cover | Eric Shanower | 1 | | B | Variant Cover | Dean Rankine | 2 | | C | Limited Edition Black & White Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Eric Shanower | 3 |
